work-item.field:
Once imported you will want to review the recognized requirements and fine tune the result. Perform following tasks to familiarize yourself with the document editing mode.
  • Create a new requirement by marking a text section as new requirement
  • Create a new requirement by splitting a big requirement into two requirements using the [enter] key
  • Create a new requirement between two existing requirements
  • Unmark a requirement which was not recognized correctly by left clicking the requirements icon located at the left side of your specification.
  • Select two requirements with your mouse and move them into a different section of the document
    Attention: Please ensure that after cut/paste the requirement has no temporary id.

    This may happen when the selection of one work item was not recognized. In case of problems just add a section above and below the work item before you move it.
